Model
Class PreProcessingHandler

java.lang.Object
  Model.PreProcessingHandler

public class PreProcessingHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for communicating with other classes that are involved in handling the PreProcessing Flow.

doQualityProcessing

public boolean doQualityProcessing(int qSum,
                                   int qASCII)
                            throws java.io.IOException
This method appends an input line to the Quality.txt file. Input line is only appended to the file, if the the line's quality thresholds is above the set thresholds.

Parameters:
qSum -
qASCII -
Throws:
java.io.IOException

makeGroups

public void makeGroups(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groups)
This method creates empty group files as initiation. Note that it does not add identifications into each file, it merely creates empty files based on the list of available groups. A 2-D array of Strings is passed in. It is also made available as a local attribute to be accessed by doGrouping(); The file created is stored in a list of files and the Group created is stored in a list of groups. A group will correspond to a file and will have the same index for easy retrieval in the doGrouping()

Parameters:
groups - A 2-D array of Strings that contains Ids for each group

doGrouping

public void doGrouping(int idLeft,
                       int idRight)
This method grabs the identification of the current line of input to be processed, and it looks through all the group files available. When it finds the file the identification belongs in, it appends the identification to the end of the file. NOTE: This method works only if the user selects the identification region from the first input file.

Parameters:
idLeft - The left index of the identification region.
idRight - The right index of the identification region.

doTagFile

public final void doTagFile()
Go through every ShortRead and create a tag file based on it. The tag file will contain the id and count.

checkGroupsForConflicts

public boolean checkGroupsForConflicts()
This method checks the list of groups for conflicting identifications. The method only check conflicts for one wildcard in the identification.

Returns:
true if there is a conflict; false otherwise.
